fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry
eu_initiatives: Angus Council is currently engaged on projects with the SRDP, ERDF,ESF and INTERREG programmes. We have a partnership called East of Scotland European Coalition which requires support in Brussels and includes familiarisations visits.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
membership: Angus Council is a member of the Dundee and Angus Chamber of Commerce, Federation of Small Businesses.
relevant_communication: Through COSLA representatives policy and programme developments are supported and consulted on to ensure  local feedback is given. projects supporting employment, enterprise and rural development are on going in the area.
goals__remit: To support local people, businesses and organisations in Angus, a new Economic Strategy has been produced which runs from 2014 – 2020 and includes priorities including supporting Enterprise and Infrastructure, supporting Pride in Place, supporting Communities and supporting Skills. The strategy is available to view at www.anguscouncil.gov.uk under Economic Development.
